title: No More Nice Guy Nonsense (Ep 1386)
description:
In this episode, I discuss what the Trump campaign must do in order to ensure that every legal vote is counted. There is a path forward to victory. 

News Picks:

How the right can organize like the left.


Hold your horses on Arizona!

Yes, the left got crushed.

What’s going on in Pennsylvania?

The polling industry blew it, again.


If Biden wins, he’s already a lame duck.

President Trump did extremely well with Black voters.  

The House GOP picks up a bunch of Democrat seats.


The real story of the Biden Crime Family.
